name: Victorian Mysteries: The Yellow Room
detailed_description: In this hidden object adventure a young woman is attacked and murdered in the middle of the night inside a locked room. There are only two ways out: a dead- bolted door and a single window blocked by iron bars. How did the murderer escape? Solve this perplexing conundrum and thrilling riddle in "Victorian Mysteries: The Yellow Room".
about_the_game: In this hidden object adventure a young woman is attacked and murdered in the middle of the night inside a locked room. There are only two ways out: a dead- bolted door and a single window blocked by iron bars. How did the murderer escape? Solve this perplexing conundrum and thrilling riddle in "Victorian Mysteries: The Yellow Room".
short_description: In this hidden object adventure a young woman is attacked and murdered in the middle of the night inside a locked room. There are only two ways out: a dead- bolted door and a single window blocked by iron bars. How did the murderer escape?
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.0GHz CPU
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
